entry.value:
[["currentConversationId","pins","agentExecutionMode","isPanelCollapsed","displayedAnnouncements","conversations","a|0|1|2|3|4|5","9be668f8-2557-443f-89e8-3fd19dc61059","o|","manual","b|F","a|","b9236c6c-8bdd-40c3-a414-9d56e02ae925","a|C|7","id","createdAtIso","lastInteractedAtIso","selectedModelId","requestIds","isPinned","isShareable","extraData","personaType","rootTaskUuid","toolUseStates","chatHistory","feedbackStates","draftExchange","a|E|F|G|H|I|J|K|L|M|N|O|P|Q|R","2026-01-16T02:58:10.721Z","2026-01-16T07:18:05.316Z","claude-sonnet-4-5","isAgentConversation","baselineTimestamp","a|W|X","n|0","o|Y|A|Z","a1c5c0e1-f040-4669-896b-b1847035a1ec","request_id","uuid","chatItemType","status","fromTimestamp","toTimestamp","seen_state","a|c|d|e|f|g|h|i","413beef5-9463-4b88-a137-378eb4e75cdd","38cee5d1-93c5-48ac-aee8-4e1086bc0448","agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","success","n|V8QnDak","seen","o|j|k|l|m|n|Z|o|p","exchangeUuid","timestamp","request_message","a|e|r|s|t|f|i","exchange-pointer","d9739026-bd80-4647-afef-cb7a9a187ed1","2026-01-16T03:11:54.640Z","想实现一个融合的对象存储服务，可以支持客户端将文件上传和下载到任意兼容S3标准的对象存储服务，例如AWS S3、IDrive E2、MinIO等。我的Storage-Service用于管理各种存储源的endpoint、stsendpoint、accessKeyId、secretKey等信息。
1. 对于文件上传：客户端向Storage-Service请求STS临时accessKey和secretKey的临时凭证，然后用S3提供的Java Script SDK向对象存储服务发起文件上传请求，对于大文件，会执行分片上传。
2. 对于文件下载：客户端向Storage-Service请求预签名URL，执行文件下载。

另外还有一个重要的需求：就是要对客户端屏蔽不同的存储源的域名，提供一个统一的域名。方式客户端窥探我们后台使用的云存储服务的类型。我的想法是使用Cloudflare上托管的域名cname到不同存储源的真实endpoint，并开启cloudflare的proxy代理。这样既可以隐藏域名，有不会出现性能瓶颈(相比于用Nginx反向代理来隐藏源endpoint的方式)。

现在，请帮我分析这个方案的可行性。简明扼要","o|u|v|w|x|y|n|p","1ce9f37f-57db-4cfa-b9bc-0e37c348f9e6","2026-01-16T03:14:24.443Z","如果有些不支持STS协议的云存储，应该是可以支持预签名分片上传功能的，是否可以用预签名分片上传功能代替。","o|u|v|10|11|12|n|p","d2d9729c-cde6-492d-818e-59e57cc1c55d","2026-01-16T03:16:07.258Z","S3的Java Script客户端支持逾千名分片上传吗？还是说需要自己开发SDK","o|u|v|14|15|16|n|p","bd6c954f-7b79-438d-b2b4-96085bdc9ed6","2026-01-16T03:23:46.285Z","@/storage-service 请将我的设计思路整理成一个完整的文档，放在doc目录下，我会根据这个文档使用Agent开发代码","o|u|v|18|19|1A|n|p","91767f00-793b-4ca8-9d4c-8ebfc17d4347","2026-01-16T03:26:30.246Z","我想要实现一个类似S3 Browser的Web版，S3有类似 S3 Browser的web版的SDK吗？","o|u|v|1C|1D|1E|n|p","4597c232-92de-4e36-a995-3f8e0a29b0aa","2026-01-16T05:25:12.030Z","如果要支持分片上传的断点续传好实现吗？比如用户刷新了界面之后，20个分片的文件，传输了10个分片停止了，后续打开页面想要继续上传剩余的1讴歌分片","o|u|v|1G|1H|1I|n|p","6d0938a8-c1aa-4bfd-87d9-c9c224a668bc","2026-01-16T06:51:06.621Z","好的，请帮我更新文档，把上传的断点续传功能也加入进去","o|u|v|1K|1L|1M|n|p","960be3e9-55e3-4559-bf63-94fd2466a63f","2026-01-16T07:18:05.318Z","请帮我把Create Domain.md文档中的文字整理成markdown格式","o|u|v|1O|1P|1Q|n|p","a|q|z|13|17|1B|1F|1J|1N|1R","rich_text_json_repr","mentioned_items","a|t|1T|f|1U","","type","content","a|1X|1Y","doc","a|1X","paragraph","o|1b|1c","a|1d","o|1Z|1a|1e","draft","o|1V|1W|1f|1g|B","o|S|C|T|U|V|B|A|A|a|Z|b|8|1S|8|1h","2026-01-16T07:20:30.378Z","2026-01-16T07:47:29.547Z","b|T","o|Y|1l|Z","505f296d-328f-462a-8d35-3e2fb4180e8f","41988358-cfc4-4793-b2c3-6ff829c08059","19fc3500-b144-4fe0-b7f4-6c4c6d233187","n|V8QsV4d","o|j|1o|1p|m|n|Z|1q|p","b5c1838d-99d8-4e71-a620-6962ca07cece","2026-01-16T07:24:33.341Z","请阅读Create Domain.md然后帮我补充我的实践经验。
1. Cloudflare的配置CNAME类型的DNS记录时，不支持Cloudflare上的一个域名A CNAME到Cloudflare上的另一个域名B，除非域名A和B托管在同一个Cloudflare账号下。
2. 如果源头服务器要想和Cloudflare之间实现HTTPS的安全数据传输，可以将Cloudflare的证书部署在源服务器上，并且SSL/TSL设置成FULL模式，而非Full Strict模式。如果要使用Full Strict模式，源服务器必须部署权威CA证书","o|u|v|1s|1t|1u|n|p","86004a32-ae27-4a96-b51e-9ab014c38a03","2026-01-16T07:24:40.201Z","o|u|v|1w|1x|1W|n|p","1f56cd41-971e-4105-8131-73251f13cefb","2026-01-16T07:25:07.305Z","o|u|v|1z|20|1W|n|p","f61adf5a-e303-4e41-95dd-2dccd30f1c35","2026-01-16T07:25:23.996Z","o|u|v|22|23|1W|n|p","fe920122-b0dd-4fb6-8d26-506f984e4d08","b9c3506e-ff17-4854-a165-160e83d4f6ac","n|V8RsZuq","o|j|25|26|m|n|1q|27|p","5094a669-c842-4f72-a02d-571e1e98aefb","2026-01-16T07:47:29.550Z","为什么Interface A继承interface B的时候要重写interface B中的方法呢？这样做的意义是什么，是为了写新的注释吗？","o|u|v|29|2A|2B|n|p","f6e8e16a-ae09-4c72-a1c2-34de859819dd","2026-01-16T07:47:35.938Z","o|u|v|2D|2E|1W|n|p","temp-fe-7ded720a-6723-4983-9392-2e0b9e8b812e","2026-01-16T07:47:46.601Z","cancelled","o|u|v|2G|2H|1W|2I|p","a|c|f|e|i","19f1f57c-d3c3-49fb-af6c-f496ecd08545","agentic-turn-delimiter","o|2K|2L|2I|2M|p","a|1r|1v|1y|21|24|28|2C|2F|2J|2N","a|t|1T|f","o|2P|1W|1f|1g","o|S|7|1j|1k|V|B|A|A|1m|Z|1n|8|2O|8|2Q","o|D|1i|2R","o|6|7|8|9|A|B|2S"],"2T"]
